name: Sensory Support & Self-Regulation
description: Learn therapeutic techniques for sensory processing and emotional regulation for individuals with autism, ADHD, and sensory processing disorders

sections.name: Assistive Tools for Regulation
sections.description: Use technology to support sensory needs and enhance daily functioning

name: Communication & Accessibility Skills
description: Comprehensive learning path covering multiple communication methods for individuals with special needs - visual, tactile, and technology-assisted

sections.description: Learn sign language for deaf and hard of hearing communication

sections.name: Tactile Communication
sections.description: Master Braille for visually impaired literacy and communication

name: Full Accessibility & Special Needs Certification
description: Complete learning path for individuals seeking comprehensive special needs education and assistive technology mastery - covers all communication methods and self-regulation techniques
